characters.name: Charmander
characters.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

characters.name: Pikachu
characters.description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

characters.name: Poliwag
characters.description: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.

characters.name: Onix
characters.description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
